definition: supernatural forces and events and beings collectively, hide from view, having an import not apparent to the senses nor obvious to the intelligence
details:
noun
- supernatural forces and events and beings collectively
= synonyms: supernatural
- supernatural practices and techniques
= example: supernatural practices and techniques
= synonyms: occult arts
verb
- hide from view
= example: hide from view
- become concealed or hidden from view or have its light extinguished
= example: become concealed or hidden from view or have its light extinguished
- cause an eclipse of (a celestial body) by intervention
= synonyms: eclipse
adjective
- having an import not apparent to the senses nor obvious to the intelligence
= synonyms: secret
- hidden and difficult to see
= example: hidden and difficult to see
